originalText.text: I was not happy with this Dr. I found her to be very conceited, callous, and have zero interest in getting to the bottom of my injury. Her staff was also rude and never returned phone calls. If she can’t make money off you by operating, she wants nothing to do with you.

text.text: I was not happy with this Dr. I found her to be very conceited, callous, and have zero interest in getting to the bottom of my injury. Her staff was also rude and never returned phone calls. If she can’t make money off you by operating, she wants nothing to do with you.

originalText.text:
Had extensive knee + leg surgery and Dr. Shubin Stein and her team were excellent through the whole experience. From the initial consult to the first set of surgeries to the check ins 1 year later they were always focused on making sure the right options were considered to meet my goals. My recovery went smoothly and any extra support I needed (referrals, extra visits) were all taken care of.

Scheduling was easy, payments/insurance was smooth, and the care + surgery was world class.

THANKS DR SHUBIN STEIN!!! Can't wait to invite you out to my Ironman race in a year :D

originalText.text: Dr. Shubin Stein cared for our son John’s torn meniscus.  When we knew he needed his meniscus repaired we knew HSS was the place to go.  She made so much time to speak to us during our first visit to make sure we were comfortable with everything that will take place.  The day of his surgery she came out in-between surgeries to check on him.  She has an amazing office staff that is responsive to your request and has compassion for their patients.

originalText.text: Dr. Shubin Stein is a world-class surgeon and was the perfect choice for our daughter's reconstructive knee, and first-ever orthopedic, surgery. Dr. Shubin Stein is thorough, efficient, and committed to providing her patients with the best possible outcomes. Our daughter's recovery is ahead of schedule and her prognosis for full mobility excellent as a direct result of being under Dr. Shubin Stein's and her team's excellent care.

originalText.text:
Had a visit with Dr Shubin Stein today ,and i must say i had a wonderful experience.
Dr Shubin  Stein was very professional explaining all about my future shoulder surgery.
I surely feel making the decision to see Dr Shubin  Stein was the right choice, and i looking forward to getting back my quality of life.
UPDATE..7/7/2020
Had Dr Beth Shubin Stein preform right shoulder rotator cuff surgery and i must say Dr Shubin Stein is truly a Professional surgeon  and One remarkable Person.
My left shoulder was repaired last January and Now My right shoulder....definitely looking  forward to  a better quality of life.
Thankyou Dr. Beth Shubin Stein.
Best regards
Chris Borgatti
